Trader Destock
Enable
Debug Mode
Enables message spam in console

Below you can define the maximum amount of items each trader can have after restock.
 Setting slider to 0 will completely remove items in a group.
 Setting slider to -1 will ignore items in a group and won't remove anything.

Max percent of ammo from initial stock to sell
-10 will not touch the ammo
Sell ammo only for guns in stock
Max amount of eatables (food, drinks, cigarettes) in stock.
Non-barman traders will have 50% less than defined amount
Max amount of medical items in stock.
Non-medic traders will have 50% less than defined amount
Max amount of repair items in stock.
Non-mechanic traders will have 50% less than defined amount
Randomize
The amount of items will fluctuate from defined amount in MCM
Randomize deviation (%)
100% - items fluctuate between 0 and 2x amount\n 50% - items fluctuate between 0.5x and 1.5x amount
